Home.PowerDesc: Our goal is to help a cause what the community find worthy. You can participate in a voting periodically to determine what the raised funds from the transactions will be used for.
Home.InnovationDesc1: Innovating blockchain technology like you have never seen before!
Home.InnovationDesc2: All the procedures are happening within the Smart Contract of the token to ensure transparency and security. This implementation helps us to defeat manipulations of the voting to give every option and participants a fair and even playing field.
Home.TokenomicsSubtitle: Three actions are happening at each transaction defined by the Smart Contract
Home.TokenomicsReflectionsDesc: {{percent}}% tokens of every transaction are redistributed between holders proportionately
Home.TokenomicsPollFundingDesc: {{percent}}% tokens of every transaction are added to the funding wallet which will be used to help the cause You aimed for
Home.TokenomicsLiquidityDesc: {{percent}}% tokens of every transaction are added to the liquidity pool helping the growth of the token
Home.LaunchDesc1: 100% of the tokens are available from the start with a Fair Launch
Home.LaunchDesc2: Proof of Stake token on the Binance Smart Chain
Home.LaunchDesc4: Liquidity Pools (LP tokens) are locked until 01.01.2099
